name: Cotton Mouth Wintergreen Nicotine Infused Cotton
short_description: Cotton Mouth Wintergreen features a flavor of aromatic evergreen mint blended with light sweetness.
description:
Product Highlights

  • Aromatic evergreen mint blends with light sweetness.
  • Pinch & pack as much as you desire
  • Tobacco-free

Discover Cotton Mouth Wintergreen Nicotine Infused Cotton

Cotton Mouth Wintergreen Nicotine Infused Cotton features a wintergreen flavor with aromatic evergreen mint and light sweetness. This nicotine-infused product is available in the form of cotton balls. It is tobacco-free and made with synthetic fibers and synthetic nicotine. Each ball contains approximately 1mg of nicotine, with a total of 99mg per can. Cotton Mouth Wintergreen is available for purchase individually or in packs of 5, 10, 25, or 50 at Northerner.

Usage Instructions: Open the Cotton Mouth Wintergreen container and select the desired amount of cotton. We recommend starting with 6-8 balls. Place the product between your upper or lower lip and gum. Keep it in place for 30-45 minutes before removing. To open the container, press down on the side tab located on the top lid marked "PUSH" and apply pressure to release the lid.

About Cotton Mouth

Cotton Mouth is a brand that produces oral nicotine products available in five flavors to suit various preferences. The brand caters to adult nicotine users seeking tobacco-free options.
ingredient_list: Propylene glycol, polyester substrate, vegetable glycerin, water, food grade natural & artificial flavoring, triacetin, nicotine, sucralose.
product_characteristics: Contains Artificial Sweetners,Contains Flavoring,Contains Nicotine,Gluten Free
